description: The Umbrella Prgramme (Institutional Support for the Constitutional drafting process and promotion if inclusive participation)

subproject.corporate outcome: Effective, responsive, accessible and fair justice systems promote the rule of law, including both formal and informal processes, with due consideration on the rights of the poor, women and vulnerable groups
subproject.description: Provide for specific settings in which members of the constitutional committee can exchange ideas with international experts on the institutional planning of the constitution-making process, and on comparative approaches to constitutional issues.
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: constitutional draftng support

title: Institutional support for the constitutional drafting
